properties.entry:
CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW csr AS ( SELECT rel, tid, att,
prov_source_tramp_tid , NULL::varbit AS prov_source_tramp_att,
prov_source_soupkitchen_tid , CASE WHEN prov_source_soupkitchen_tid IS NOT NULL THEN 'B010'::varbit ELSE NULL END AS prov_source_soupkitchen_att,
prov_source_socialworker_tid , NULL::varbit AS prov_source_socialworker_att,
prov_source_socialworker_1_tid, CASE WHEN prov_source_socialworker_1_tid IS NOT NULL THEN 'B100'::varbit ELSE NULL::varbit END AS prov_source_socialworker_1_att FROM ( SELECT errors.rel, errors.tid, errors.att, prov_source_tramp_tid , prov_source_soupkitchen_tid , prov_source_socialworker_tid , prov_source_socialworker_1_tid FROM prov_name, (SELECT * FROM errm WHERE att & 'B10'::varbit != 'B00'::varbit) AS errors WHERE errors.tid = prov_name.tid UNION ALL SELECT errors.rel, errors.tid, errors.att, prov_source_tramp_tid , prov_source_soupkitchen_tid , prov_source_socialworker_tid , prov_source_socialworker_1_tid FROM prov_livesin, (SELECT * FROM errm WHERE att & 'B01'::varbit != 'B00'::varbit) AS errors WHERE errors.tid = prov_livesin.tid ) pp )
